description: Generate high-quality blog posts, articles, or marketing copy from just a topic and tone. Includes SEO optimization.

config.text: Professional, informative, engaging for business executives

config.system_prompt: Create a detailed outline for a blog post about the given topic. Include: 1) Catchy title, 2) Introduction hook, 3) 4-6 main sections with bullet points, 4) Conclusion. Consider SEO and reader engagement.

Write a comprehensive, engaging article based on the outline and topic. Use the specified tone. Include relevant examples, data points, and actionable insights. Aim for 800-1200 words. Use subheadings and bullet points for readability.
Analyze the content and provide SEO recommendations: 1) Meta description (150-160 chars), 2) 5-8 relevant keywords, 3) 3 internal link suggestions, 4) Social media caption for LinkedIn/Twitter.

Suggest 3-4 relevant images/graphics for this article. For each suggestion provide: 1) Description of the image, 2) Where to place it in the article, 3) Alt text for SEO. Focus on images that support the content and improve engagement.
